_description: Randomly change hue, saturation and value of the input image.
name: HueSaturationValue

hue_shift_limit._description: Range for changing hue. If hue_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-hue_shift_limit, hue_shift_limit).

sat_shift_limit._description: Range for changing saturation. If sat_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-sat_shift_limit, sat_shift_limit).

val_shift_limit._description: Range for changing value. If val_shift_limit is a single int, the range will be (-val_shift_limit, val_shift_limit).

always_apply._description: If True, the augmentation is always applied.
